00002 ! Subroutine : Stats
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00036 
00037  SUBROUTINE Stats
00038 
00039 !  Common Variables
00040  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00041  USE Domain,    ONLY : iStep, invInitVol, invPi, tCall, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00042  USE FluidParams
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 !  Local Variables
00046  INTEGER :: i, j, nodesIn, nodesOut
00047  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Pin, Pout, R, Ro, Ref, Pdif, Perr, Ux, Uy, Vef, Vol
00049 
00050 ! Initialize
00051  Pin  = 0.D0
00052  Pout = 0.D0
00053  Ux   = 0.D0
00054  Uy   = 0.D0
00055  Vol  = 0.D0
00056  nodesIn  = 0
00057  nodesOut = 0
00058  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00059 
00060 ! Calculate pressure inside and outside the bubble
00061  DO j = ymin, ymax
00062    DO i = xmin, xmax
00063 
00064      R =  DSQRT( (DBLE(i)-bubbles(1,1))**2 + (DBLE(j)-bubbles(1,2))**2 )
00065      IF (R < (Ro - IntWidth)) THEN
00066        Pin = Pin + p(i,j)
00067        nodesIn = nodesIn + 1
00068      ELSE IF (R > (Ro + IntWidth)) THEN
00069        Pout = Pout + p(i,j)
00070        nodesOut = nodesOut + 1
00071      END IF
00072 
00073      IF (rho(i,j) < rhoStar) THEN
00074        Ux  = Ux  + u(i,j,1)
00075        Uy  = Uy  + u(i,j,2)
00076        Vol = Vol + 1.D0
00077      END IF
00078 
00079    END DO
00080  END DO
00081 
00082 ! Calculate pressure difference and error
00083  Pin  = Pin/DBLE(nodesIn)
00084  Pout = Pout/DBLE(nodesOut)
00085  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00086  Perr = (sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00087 
00088 ! Save the initial volume during the first time step
00089  IF( iStep == 0 ) invInitVol = 1.D0/Vol
00090 
00091 ! Calculate average bubble/drop velocity and mass conservation
00092  Ux  = Ux/Vol
00093  Uy  = Uy/Vol
00094  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00095  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00096 
00097  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "stats.out", STATUS = "UNKNOWN", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00098       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00099  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00100    WRITE(10,'(I9,6ES19.9)')istep,Ux,Uy,Vef,Ref,Pdif,Perr
00101    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00102  ELSE
00103    CALL MemAlloc(2)
00104    STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'stats.out'."
00105  END IF
00106 
00107 ! Analyze convergence - Done over a certain period of time ( 10 x tStats ) to 
00108 ! ensure that long range fluctuations do not give false positives
00109  Convergence(tCall) = Pdif
00110  IF ( MOD(tCall,11) == 0 ) THEN
00111    eps   = 0.D0
00112    tCall = 1
00113    DO i = 2, 11
00114      eps = eps + DABS( Convergence(i) - Convergence(i-1) )
00115    END DO
00116    eps = eps*0.1D0/Pdif
00117  ELSE
00118    tCall = tCall + 1
00119  END IF
00120 
00121  RETURN
00122  END SUBROUTINE Stats
00123
